Keywords: Assassin , Soldier , Weapon X
Real Name: Arkady Rossovich
Special Powers
YOU SEE, KOTIK UNDERSTANDS ME: When Omega Red starts the game, generate a Kotik bystander.
YOU ARE NOT ENEMY TO ME, YOU ARE RATIONS!: Steal Energy, Giant Reach: 3.
DO NOT MAKE ME KILL YOU...WOULD BE...INCONVENIENCE: Quake, Incapacitate.

Comments
November 22, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 4-2 Omega Red is a character that just feels like he was designed for HeroClix. I have no interest in the comic version. The animated versions are okay - but when it comes to Clix, I just dig him. Okay stats means he needs help to really maximize his value, Omega Red does generally get better as the game progresses. Getting Kotik KO'd can be tricky - but I love how he is able to Power Action in Omega for some really great mobility. I'd recommend having a mastermind figure to potentially help knocking off the Pog - however, if that doesn't matter to you, Kotik is a nasty tie-up piece who just relentlessly prevents multi-target ranged pieces from going where they want. He is fun and I hope to use him again.
August 12, 2021
Goop
So really he's all about the giant reach+quake+ew combo. He can potentially get off some really nasty quakes thanks to the positioning help of his bystander pog. Overall he's good but those toughness clicks do make him a bit easy to kill. He shines best on those last 3 with CCE and flurry. Remember that steal energy only heals 1 on quake.
